VLIB_HAARDETOBJ_sClassifier Struct Reference

#include <VLIB_haarDetectObjects_types.h>

Collaboration diagram for VLIB_HAARDETOBJ_sClassifier:

[legend]

Detailed Description

This structure holds property of all the stages in the classifier. Each stage is a group of trees. Each stage also have one Threshold to decide to go to next stage or not. You can visualize it as a series of trees and then you have milestones placed at predefined location. At those locations you make decision of continuing further or aborting. The categorization of these trees in multiple parts is actually stages.

Parameters:
numStages Number of stages in classifier
maxNodesPerTree Maximum Number of nodes per tree
patchSize Size of the object for which training has been done
numTrees Array indicating number of trees in each stage.
maxRectangle Maximum number of rectangles in a node for each stage. It is possible that each stage's nodes might have different restriction on maximum number of rectangles for a node.
stageTh Array indicating Th of each stage, this is used to perform the check to perform the check to proceed or not to proceed for next stage.
tree Array describing property of each tree.
